page.title: 18Southend as a resort
page.content: {Sea-front walk} As you walk from the cliff lift along the sea-front with the sea on your left, on your right are the cliff gardens, then the arch-way cafes at Westcliff and the Cliffs Pavilion above you. Near the arch-way cafes you see Rossi's, a well known ice-cream manufacturer in the area. Their ice-cream is delicious and there are lots of different flavours. Along the Western Esplanade you can see the Westcliff Leisure Centre where lots of sporting activities go on. There is also a disco and bar there. It was built where the old outdoor swimming pool used to be. At Chalkwell you can see where the new sea-wall has been built near the bowling greens at the bottom of Chalkwell Avenue. Written by Matthew Irons(11yrs)
